description:
As monsters rampage throughout Cho-Tokyo, Wisdom announces his plans to upgrade the world through Chaosification of all monsters. Keisetsu offers to lead Gao and company to Wisdom, but Brutal of the Martial Arts stands in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wisdom no Yabaou! Kyoufu no Upgrade Sengen!!
Wisdom`s Ambition! The Terrifying Upgrade Declaration!
ウィズダムの野望! 恐怖のアップグレード宣言!!
